landing.title: AI-Powered Healthcare
landing.subtitle: Advanced medical diagnosis, doctor recommendations, and comprehensive health insights powered by artificial intelligence.
landing.describeSymptoms: Describe your symptoms... (e.g., headache, fever, chest pain)
landing.searchDoctorsBy: Search doctors by name, specialty, or location
landing.searchTestCentersBy: Search test centers by name, services, or location
landing.searchHospitalsBy: Search hospitals by name, services, or location
landing.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all available options.
landing.featureDesc1: Enter your symptoms and get matched with the right specialists, nearby doctors, and test centers using AI-powered recommendations.
landing.featureDesc2: Upload prescriptions and health documents. Our AI explains diagnoses in simple terms and suggests next steps for better care.
landing.featureDesc3: Automated creation of your personal health timeline and knowledge graph from uploaded documents and medical history.
landing.advancedAIPlatform: Advanced AI-powered platform bridging the gap between patients and healthcare providers
landing.chatbotDesc: AI-powered assistant using your health data
landing.dashboardDesc: Visualize health trends and diagnosis timeline
landing.portalDesc: Professionals can access structured patient data
landing.costDesc: Estimate treatment costs and required tests
landing.brand: Your trusted AI-powered healthcare companion. Advanced medical insights, doctor recommendations, and comprehensive health management at your fingertips.
landing.noResultsMessage: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all available options.
